abstractText: A Nepalese concertina paper manuscript containing Bauddha Stotras (Avalokiteśvarabhaṭṭārakakaruṇāṣṭakastotra, Pañcatathāgatastotra, etc.) with a Newari translation. .
abstractShort: A Nepalese concertina paper manuscript containing Bauddha Stotras (Avalokiteśvarabhaṭṭārakakaruṇāṣṭakastotra, Pañcatathāgatastotra,
title: Bauddha Stotras
